hero.title: Empowering OBC Communities Through Unity & Action
hero.subtitle: OBC Runsangram Organization is dedicated to the protection, development, and empowerment of Other Backward Classes, Nomadic & Denotified Tribes, Alutedar, Balutedar, and Micro-OBC communities — socially, economically, educationally, and politically.

about.heading: ABOUT US
about.para1: OBC Runsangram Organization is a social and political movement dedicated to the protection, development, and empowerment of the Other Backward Classes (OBC) and allied marginalized communities.
about.para2: We function based on constitutional values and actively work for the social, economic, educational, and political upliftment of OBC society. Our organization brings together diverse OBC groups to address their challenges and fight injustice collectively.
about.visionText: To create an empowered, educated, and economically strong OBC community that participates actively in nation-building while preserving its cultural identity and constitutional rights.
about.missionText: To protect reservation rights, provide educational support, offer legal assistance, and empower OBC communities through comprehensive development programs and political representation.

communities.title: Communities We Represent
communities.subtitle: We represent and work for the welfare of diverse communities that fall under the Other Backward Classes category.

objectives.title: Working for Community Welfare
objectives.subtitle: We are committed to the holistic development of OBC communities through these key initiatives, ensuring progress in every aspect of life.
objectives.reservationDesc: Safeguarding and strengthening the constitutional reservation benefits for OBC communities in education, employment, and governance.
objectives.fakeCertDesc: Working to eliminate the menace of fake caste certificates that deprive genuine OBC candidates of their rightful opportunities.
objectives.educationDesc: Comprehensive educational initiatives to ensure OBC students have access to quality education and career opportunities.
objectives.economicDesc: Programs designed to improve the economic condition of OBC communities through skill development and entrepreneurship.
objectives.legalDesc: Providing legal aid and advocacy to community members facing discrimination, rights violations, or legal challenges.
objectives.healthDesc: Healthcare initiatives and welfare programs to ensure the physical and mental well-being of community members.
objectives.womenDesc: Special focus on uplifting women in OBC communities through education, skill development, and leadership opportunities.
objectives.politicalDesc: Encouraging active political participation and ensuring adequate representation of OBC communities in governance.
objectives.culturalDesc: Celebrating and preserving the rich cultural heritage, traditions, and identity of various OBC communities.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with us. Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

footer.description: OBC Runsangram Organization is dedicated to the protection, development, and empowerment of Other Backward Classes, Nomadic & Denotified Tribes, and allied marginalized communities.
footer.rights: OBC Rann Sangram Organization. All rights reserved.
footer.tagline: Empowering OBC Communities Through Unity & Action

queries.title: Queries
queries.subtitle: Have a question or concern? Reach out to us and we’ll respond as soon as possible.
